coordination_models_of_Ca2+: seven-oxygen coordination (one from DMF, six from four H4BINDI ligands)
six-oxygen coordination (all six from four H4BINDI ligands)
synthesis_conditions.network_change: original square network of Ca-NDI turned into a rhombic network in Py@Ca-NDI
synthesis_conditions.solvent_replacement_confirmation: decreased loss of weight before 600°C of Py@Ca-NDI than Ca-NDI
synthesis_conditions.absorption_shift: intense absorption from 450 to 800 nm for Py@Ca-NDI

synthesis_conditions.dispersion_stability: size remains nearly the same over 48 hours
synthesis_conditions.absorption_spectra: maintains the absorption band at 500–800 nm
synthesis_conditions.comparison_with_Ca-NDI: 10-fold temperature increase (ΔT ≈ 30°C vs. ΔT ≈ 3°C) within 2 min of NIR laser irradiation (653 nm, 0.5 W cm^-2)
synthesis_conditions.concentration_and_power_intensity_contro: notable temperature increment of 20°C achieved in just 3 mins of NIR laser irradiation (653 nm) at a lower power (0.3 W cm^-2) and lower concentration (1 mg mL^-1)
